languages.text: {n}Заскучавший Капеллан морщится.{/n} "Я, честно говоря, уже начал подозревать, что "Фиделио" в завещании — это просто шутка Денза. Очень на него похоже. Он, верно, и рад был бы, чтобы на его похоронах все передрались".

{n}Chaplain winces, looking bored.{/n} "Frankly, I'm beginning to suspect that this 'Fidelio' from the will is just one of Denz's jokes. A stunt like this would be right up his alley. I imagine he'd be ecstatic if everyone at his funeral were at each other's throats."
languages.original_text: {n}Заскучавший Капеллан морщится.{/n} "Я, честно говоря, уже начал подозревать, что "Фиделио" в завещании — это просто шутка Денза. Очень на него похоже. Он, верно, и рад был бы, чтобы на его похоронах все передрались".

traits.locale_text: {n}Chaplain winces, looking bored.{/n} "Frankly, I'm beginning to suspect that this 'Fidelio' from the will is just one of Denz's jokes. A stunt like this would be right up his alley. I imagine he'd be ecstatic if everyone at his funeral were at each other's throats."

{n}Chaplain winces, looking bored.{/n} "Frankly, I'm beginning to suspect that this 'Fidelio' from the will is just one of Denz's jokes. A stunt like this would be right up his alley. I imagine he'd be ecstatic if everyone at his funeral were at each other's throats."

{n}Chaplain winces, looking bored.{/n} "Frankly, I'm beginning to suspect that this 'Fidelio' from the will is just one of Denz's jokes. A stunt like this would be right up his alley. I imagine he'd be ecstatic if everyone at his funeral were at each other's throats."

{n}Chaplain winces, looking bored.{/n} "Frankly, I'm beginning to suspect that this 'Fidelio' from the will is just one of Denz's jokes. A stunt like this would be right up his alley. I imagine he'd be ecstatic if everyone at his funeral were at each other's throats."

{n}Chaplain winces, looking bored.{/n} "Frankly, I'm beginning to suspect that this 'Fidelio' from the will is just one of Denz's jokes. A stunt like this would be right up his alley. I imagine he'd be ecstatic if everyone at his funeral were at each other's throats."

languages.text: {n}牧师脸上的肌肉抽动着，看起来已经感到无聊了。{/n}“老实说，我已经开始怀疑遗嘱中的这个‘菲迪奥’仅仅是丹兹开的玩笑而已，像这样的花招很符合他的口味。我感觉，如果所有参加葬礼的人都开始互相厮杀，他一定会欣喜若狂。”
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain winces, looking bored.{/n} "Frankly, I'm beginning to suspect that this 'Fidelio' from the will is just one of Denz's jokes. A stunt like this would be right up his alley. I imagine he'd be ecstatic if everyone at his funeral were at each other's throats."

traits.locale_text: {n}牧师脸上的肌肉抽动着，看起来已经感到无聊了。{/n}“老实说，我已经开始怀疑遗嘱中的这个‘菲迪奥’仅仅是丹兹开的玩笑而已，像这样的花招很符合他的口味。我感觉，如果所有参加葬礼的人都开始互相厮杀，他一定会欣喜若狂。”

languages.text: {n}El capellán, aburrido, hace un gesto de dolor.{/n} «Sinceramente, empiezo a sospechar que el tal "Fidelio" es otra broma de Denz. Una jugada así sería típica de él. Seguro que le habría encantado ver a la gente matándose en su funeral».
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain winces, looking bored.{/n} "Frankly, I'm beginning to suspect that this 'Fidelio' from the will is just one of Denz's jokes. A stunt like this would be right up his alley. I imagine he'd be ecstatic if everyone at his funeral were at each other's throats."

traits.locale_text: {n}El capellán, aburrido, hace un gesto de dolor.{/n} «Sinceramente, empiezo a sospechar que el tal "Fidelio" es otra broma de Denz. Una jugada así sería típica de él. Seguro que le habría encantado ver a la gente matándose en su funeral».

languages.text: {n}教戒官が退屈そうに顔をしかめた。{/n}「率直に言うと、遺言に書かれている『フィデリオ』とやらはデンツの冗談ではないかと思えてきました。彼ならこのような演出をしかねません。自分の葬式に参列している者たちがお互いの首を狙っていると知ったら、彼は有頂天になるでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain winces, looking bored.{/n} "Frankly, I'm beginning to suspect that this 'Fidelio' from the will is just one of Denz's jokes. A stunt like this would be right up his alley. I imagine he'd be ecstatic if everyone at his funeral were at each other's throats."

traits.locale_text: {n}教戒官が退屈そうに顔をしかめた。{/n}「率直に言うと、遺言に書かれている『フィデリオ』とやらはデンツの冗談ではないかと思えてきました。彼ならこのような演出をしかねません。自分の葬式に参列している者たちがお互いの首を狙っていると知ったら、彼は有頂天になるでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Ordenspriester verzieht gelangweilt das Gesicht.{/n} "Offen gestanden vermute ich mittlerweile, dass dieser 'Fidelio' aus dem Testament nur einer von Denz' Scherzen ist. Ein solcher Streich wäre ganz nach seinem Geschmack. Er wäre begeistert, wenn alle einander bei seiner Bestattung an die Kehlen gingen."
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain winces, looking bored.{/n} "Frankly, I'm beginning to suspect that this 'Fidelio' from the will is just one of Denz's jokes. A stunt like this would be right up his alley. I imagine he'd be ecstatic if everyone at his funeral were at each other's throats."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ordenspriester verzieht gelangweilt das Gesicht.{/n} "Offen gestanden vermute ich mittlerweile, dass dieser 'Fidelio' aus dem Testament nur einer von Denz' Scherzen ist. Ein solcher Streich wäre ganz nach seinem Geschmack. Er wäre begeistert, wenn alle einander bei seiner Bestattung an die Kehlen gingen."

languages.text: {n}Chapelain, qui s'ennuie visiblement, fait la grimace.{/n} « Franchement, j'en viens à me demander si ce fameux Fidélio ne serait pas simplement une mauvaise plaisanterie de Denz. Ce serait bien son genre. Rien ne lui aurait fait plus plaisir que de voir ses invités se sauter à la gorge à ses propres funérailles. »
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain winces, looking bored.{/n} "Frankly, I'm beginning to suspect that this 'Fidelio' from the will is just one of Denz's jokes. A stunt like this would be right up his alley. I imagine he'd be ecstatic if everyone at his funeral were at each other's throats."

traits.locale_text: {n}Chapelain, qui s'ennuie visiblement, fait la grimace.{/n} « Franchement, j'en viens à me demander si ce fameux Fidélio ne serait pas simplement une mauvaise plaisanterie de Denz. Ce serait bien son genre. Rien ne lui aurait fait plus plaisir que de voir ses invités se sauter à la gorge à ses propres funérailles. »

languages.text: {n}Papaz, yüzünü buruşturuyor. Sıkıldığı her hâlinden belli.{/n} "Açıkçası vasiyetnamedeki bu 'Fidelio'nun Denz'in şakalarından biri olduğundan şüphelenmeye başladım. Tam ona göre bir hinlik. Cenazesinde herkesin birbirinin boğazına yapıştığını bilse zevkten dört köşe olurdu."
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain winces, looking bored.{/n} "Frankly, I'm beginning to suspect that this 'Fidelio' from the will is just one of Denz's jokes. A stunt like this would be right up his alley. I imagine he'd be ecstatic if everyone at his funeral were at each other's throats."

traits.locale_text: {n}Papaz, canı sıkılmış gibi gözüküyor ve yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} "Açıkçası vasiyetnamedeki bu 'Fidelio'nun Denz'in şakalarından biri olduğundan şüphelenmeye başladım. Tam ona göre bir hinlik. Cenazesinde herkesin elinin birbirinin boğazında olduğunu bilse zevkten dört köşe olurdu."
